SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
APIMenu
The APIMenu class creates a menu that provides the user with six different options: Specify Text File - gives the user the option of inserting the text file which is then sent to the ProcessParseFile Class. Configure Dictionary - gives the user the option of inserting the Dictionary or use the default value. Configure Common Words - gives the user the option of inserting a file with a StopWords List or use the default value Specify Output File - give the user the option to specify the file to output or use the default value "index.txt" Execute - This option calls the BuildWordIndex class to process the files and generate the report. Quit - End the program.
BuildWordIndex
BuildWordIndex makes the correlation between the file to be analyzed with the StopWords and searches the definitions of the words in the dictionary.
FileText
FileText interface defines the method signatures for the methods in the FileTextImpl Class and FileTextOut Class.
FileTextImpl
This FileTextImpl class stores the name of the files introduced by the user that will be used to process the text.
FileTextOut
Define the output file or use the default value "index.txt" This class implements FileText interface
ProcessParseFile
The ProcessParseFile class uses virtual threads to process files entered by the user.
Runner
The application is run using the Runner Class.
WordSortMap
the WordSortMap class provides two methods to sort words by value by the frequency in which they appear in the text.
